name: azure-storage-simple
description: Simplified Interfaces for Azure Storage Services (Tables, Queues, Blob)
author: Michael J. Ryan <tracker1@gmail.com>

scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags
